title: E-mail Problem with Thunderbird
content:
I recently lost my connection to my ISP and have re-established my connection, but Thunderbird can receive mail but cannot send it. I can send from the ISP mailbox. For some reason Thunderbird will not connect to my ISP’s outgoing mail server. Any ideas will be appreciated.

frg@suddenlink.net
creator: frg8

title: "Sent" folder in Settings.

I would like to retrieve the "Sent" folder for both accounts. What should I do to correct the mistakes? Thank you and I look forward to hearing from you. Sheila Herman
creator: swherman

title: Regarding the issue of emails being sent to destinations other than their intended recipients when sending emails consecutively
content:
I followed the steps below on a Windows 11 device, Thunderbird 115.18.0esr, and the issue occurred as shown in the results. Is this an existing or new bug?

Also, are there any countermeasures?

<Procedure> ① Prepare a 6MB file ② Prepare 50 recipient addresses ③ Prepare 5 CC addresses ④ Create 50 emails for each recipient (file: '①', CC: '③') and save as drafts. ⑤ Copy the email created in '④' to Explorer. ⑥ Select all '④' and press Enter to open 50 windows. ⑦ Press the Mail button repeatedly from the top window to the top left. ⑧ Drag and drop the email file from '⑤' into the draft and perform '⑥' and '⑦'. ⑨ Repeat '⑧'.

<Results> After approximately 70 attempts, we encountered issues where the sending process would not complete and the window would not close, and the email in that window would be sent to an address other than the one specified. The email was not sent to the correct address, so pressing Cancel and sending again worked correctly (sent to the correct recipient).
creator: thunders

title: Download issue
content: I had to rebuild my Thunderbird profile and all seemed ok. However, I now have a possible download issue. As you can see from the attachment, the blue download indicator is stuck as shown. On the attachment I have also shown the activity indicator screenshots from over an hour and which shows almost no movement. What's interesting comparing my Thunderbird United Inbox with the actual Google inbox, I seem to have all my emails in Thunderbird. Any advice?
creator: keithinoz1

title: Thunderbird levelező
content:
Kedves Támogató Csoport!

Levelező rendszerrel kapcsolatosan az alábbi probléma megoldásában kérem a segítséget: Van egy fő" levelező amelyhez két másik kollegának is van hozzáférése. A fő levelező kezelője által prioritásba tett levelek közül a prioritás jelölő (fontos, sürgős, stb) az egyik kollegának a levelezőjén rendben meg is jelennek míg a másik kollegának a levelezőjén nem , vagy nem nem megfelelően jelennek meg a cimkék, illetve ha változás történik a Fő levelezőn a cimke státuszának módosításában akkor egy egyik kollegának megfelelően jelentkezik míg a másiknak nem . A beállítások lehetnek rosszak? Amennyiben igen, úgy kérném segítsenek a probléma mielőbbi megoldásában. Köszönettel: Gubacsi Mariann
creator: gubacsimariann

title: Yrityksistä huolimatta en saa avattua sähköpostiasetuksia, lataus ei vaan onnistu
content: Yrityksistä huolimatta en pääse laittamaan sähköpostiasetuksia, lataukset eivät onnistu. Uusi laite Thunderbird sp on jo puhelimellani ja vanhalla tabletilla, tähän en saa.
